Name: Add-NetLbfoTeamMember
Synopsis: Adds a new member (network adapter) to a specified NIC team.

Name: Add-NetLbfoTeamNic
Synopsis: Adds a new interface to a NIC team.

Name: Get-NetLbfoTeam
Synopsis: Retrieves a list of NIC teams on the system, as specified by the input parameters.

Name: Get-NetLbfoTeamMember
Synopsis: Retrieves a list of network adapters that are members of a NIC team, as specified by the input parameters.

Name: Get-NetLbfoTeamNic
Synopsis: Retrieves a list of team interfaces.

Name: Remove-NetLbfoTeam
Synopsis: Removes the specified NIC team from the host.

Name: Remove-NetLbfoTeamMember
Synopsis: Removes one or more network adapters from a specified NIC team.

Name: Remove-NetLbfoTeamNic
Synopsis: Removes a team interface from a NIC team.

Name: Set-NetLbfoTeam
Synopsis: Sets parameters on the specified NIC team.

Name: Set-NetLbfoTeamMember
Synopsis: Sets the role of a member network adapter in a NIC team.

Name: Set-NetLbfoTeamNic
Synopsis: Sets a new VLAN id on a team interface, or restores the interface to Default mode.
